local_intent: Perceive maroon_object if needed, then approach and align with tight tolerance; verify end-effector is at the target.
assumptions: Maroon object is within reachable workspace on the table
Scan can recover visibility if initial check fails
coherence_with_global: Implements the perceive-then-approach phase from the GLOBAL_BT; preserves the visibility Fallback, executes ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.01, and verifies by checking IsAt before any push/retreat.
